post.body: I am going to have to think about some strategies, that's for sure...
You see what he said about hip-hop yesterday? The man is too funny..
: I agree, Zoe is pretty cool.
@cecilmenk: I think I need a separate Twitter account for so called Fillmanisms...
cuteness overload..
:aaaw! Too precious...
: it's goood..dexter is creepy cool.
ha ha. You're still our favorite!
we pretty much invaded Jimmy John's today.
crocs are the WORST.
ha ha. I hear they are really, really comfortable.
(applause).
http://tinyurl.com/3ln3dw
look at you: http://tinyurl.com/3sxow8
me too...argh..
I don't trust those Apple people.Jobs will not only show up, but he will introduce like, a flying Iphone or something.
Yes I did, about 9 months ago. I don't know what happened. But you inspired me and I thank you for that!
Reading NYT. 'fears of new ethnic conflict in Bosnia' article made me shiver...
http://twitpic.com/suwg - I told Fillman his haircut is really not that cool( which was a joke,btw) and look what he did:
Not feeling so hot today. My entire body aches and I feel sooo tired. Fillman is on his way to get me some medicine..
Internet dead. Fillman called Comcast and gave up after being on hold for 55 minutes.
Neither Draper nor Neo could save 'the day the Earth stood still.' it is bad.
Fillman,to me:"I'm bored,dance for me."
"In the realm of the senses" replacement DVD is damaged too? F@:! you Netflix!
Hello @rachelsklar!
Don't feel like getting up at all today....
last night I laughed in my sleep which Fillman thought was adorable.I'm having breakfast in bed now.
Random man on the street: "Hey,would you like to buy a hip-hop CD??" Fillman:' I like gonorrhea more than hip-hop."
Watching videos of the Saarinen baby..
Just finished watching the Ruins. God, some of the scenes were SO gross.
RTRybak says he will make downtown Minneapolis cleaner, greener and safer. oh yeah? can't wait to see that..
I can't believe how bad her extensions are..
watching the Britney documentary.
Torin just persuaded some guy to walk around downtown in his underwear tonight..Nice job.
I hate xmas music, but I LOVE Zoey Dechanel's "Baby it's cold outside". Maybe it's because I have a major girl crush on her? yep.
I had no idea I was on Technorati: http://tinyurl.com/42hseu
yes, the man in pink boxers is still out there: http://tinyurl.com/3qfbrd
Is anybody else but me watching the Fringe?
Scarjo's used tissue is worth over $2000. http://tinyurl.com/3ohjfh
Fillman just poked me on Facebook.
Nyquil is making me so sleeeepy..
Feeling really sick...
NYT article about celebrities who digg Twitter: http://tinyurl.com/992lng
oh, let's not forget @mistertures too. He doesn't like Santogold, but hey, we can't all be perfect.
I start with this:http://vimeo.com/2507263. thanks @ashleykbrown!
I think I might actually start listening to music again...
Getting ready to go over to Saarinen's.
watching this video for the 5th time today : http://tinyurl.com/7avo26
some beatnik: How do you sleep at night? Don Draper: On a bed made of money.
re-watching Mad Men, season I.
the trailer for "Trust Me:, the new show about a Chicago ad agency, looks awful. http://tinyurl.com/a4kztf
Is anybody else annoyed by "Citizen Soldier " ad/song they play before every single movie at the theater? it's by 3 doors down. 'nuff said.
Doubt was fatastic. It was a true pleasure to watch Philip S Hoffman and Meryl Streep tear each other apart.
At Block E, about to watch Doubt.
Bored.
Discussing the death of Travolta's son with Fillman: 'Marina, you DON'T know the history of Scientology.'
I got up at 9, read for a while and went back to sleep. This day is going to be weird, I can tell..
Why am I up?? This is silly..
Major douchebag alert.
Fillman wouldn't take me to Hooters so we ended up at Bellanote.
